Studio.title: Studio
Studio.description: Represents a studio using the SaaS platform.

stripeCustomerId.description: Stripe customer ID for billing purposes.

stripeSubscriptionId.description: Stripe subscription ID for recurring billing.

plan.description: The studio's current subscription plan (e.g., Basic, Pro).

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the studio profile was created.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event created by a studio for photo matching.

folderId.description: Google Drive folder ID associated with the event.

indexFile.description: Name of the index file (if applicable).

metadataFile.description: Name of the metadata file (if applicable).

driveSessionId.description: Session ID for the Google Drive connection.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the event was created.

status.description: Status of the event (e.g., indexing, active, inactive).

indexedCount.description: Number of photos indexed for the event.

plan.description: The plan selected for the event (e.g., Basic, Pro, Subscription).

pricePaid.description: Price paid for the event (if applicable).

stripePaymentId.description: Stripe payment ID for the event (if applicable).

definition.description: Stores studio profile information. Includes billing details and subscription status.
Stores event-specific data. Events are owned by studio.
